name: Ultima Business Solutions Ltd.
description: Ultima: Trusted IT Solutions Partner. For businesses that need to increase productivity by doing more with less, or want to support business growth, Ultima provides business IT services that make technology a positive asset for your organisation. Unlike many traditional resellers, we make IT work harder by better aligning it with the overall goals of your business. As an end-to-end IT service and solution provider, we have existing relationships with hundreds of vendors.

locations.address: 4th Floor Rear, New London House 6 London Street
